meanings.definition: The act of treating someone or something poorly or unfairly.
meanings.sent1: The mistreatments of the animals at the shelter were heartbreaking.
meanings.sent2: She reported the mistreatments of the elderly patients in the nursing home.
meanings.sent3: The mistreatments of the vegetables in the fridge led to a funny mix-up at dinner.
meanings.sent4: The mistreatments of the fragile glassware echoed through the empty house.
meanings.sent5: The mistreatments of the delicate flowers left a lasting impact on the garden.

meanings.definition: Instances of improper or harmful treatment.
meanings.sent1: The mistreatments of the prisoners were brought to light by the investigation.
meanings.sent2: He witnessed firsthand the mistreatments of the factory workers by their supervisors.
meanings.sent3: The mistreatments of the mischievous puppy always ended in playful chaos.
meanings.sent4: The mistreatments of the old car made it groan and sputter on the road.
meanings.sent5: The mistreatments of the delicate balance in nature can have far-reaching consequences.
